snippet: Michael Clark, the British choreographer included in the Whitney Biennial 2012, has enlisted a group of untrained dancers to perform in “Who’s Zoo?” with members of his company.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews dance concert choreographed by Michael Clark at the Whitney Biennial 2012.
lead_paragraph: Michael Clark, the British choreographer included in the Whitney Biennial 2012, has enlisted a group of untrained dancers to perform in “Who’s Zoo?” with members of his company.

headline.seo: Michael Clark’s ‘Who’s Zoo?’ at Whitney Biennial 2012
headline.main: Do Not Feed or Annoy the Dancers
headline.print_headline: Do Not Feed or Annoy the Dancers
